column1: The Pit Room////Even if you aren't a huge BBQ snob who debates how perfectly everything needs to be smoked
column2: you'll enjoy Pit Room. What sets them apart is their constant creativity. Take the tacos for example
column3: which get an A+ on both presentation and flavor. The smoked chicken with melted cheese and garlic is killer
column4: and the tender pulled pork with the pickled onion and avocado sauce drizzle is sent over the top. Tortillas are made in-house too.
